mapper.select: select K.ikid, K.kidnm, K.iclass, K.code from t_kid K join t_parent P on K.code = P.code where P.code =#{code}
mapper.update:
select uid from t_parent
update duplication_check
mapper.insert: insert into t_parent set parent_nm =#{parentNm}, uid=#{uid}, upw=#{upw}, phone_nb=#{phoneNb}, code=#{code}
